references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of Federated Learning, introducing the core concepts and algorithms used in the paper's research.

references.paper_title: SCAFFOLD: stochastic controlled averaging for federated learning
references.reason: This paper presents SCAFFOLD, an algorithm that improves the convergence and communication efficiency of federated learning, directly relevant to this paper's focus.

references.paper_title: Model soups: averaging weights of multiple fine-tuned models improves accuracy without increasing inference time
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of 'Model Soups,' which directly inspired the proposed method in this paper, providing the foundation for the model interpolation technique.

references.paper_title: Diverse weight averaging for out-of-distribution generalization
